title: Bug 102623: Image cannot be refreshed after importing again
OB: When importing an image ('image1.jpg') into the layout again, the newly imported image does not appear.
EB: The expected behavior is that the newly imported image should be displayed.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Import the 'image1.jpg' into the layout. 2. Verify that the original image is displayed. 3. Import the 'image1.jpg' again into the layout. 4. Observe that the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported image.
